circumstances:
The crew was involved in an 50 hours inspection flight. While approaching Townsville, the seaplane christened 'Coogee' hit the water surface and crashed in the Cleveland Bay. Six crew members were killed while all five other occupants were injured. 
Crew killed:
F/O Robert John Love, pilot, †
P/O Harold John Wagner, pilot, †
LAC Maurice Clayton, †
Cpl William James French, †
P/O Peter Satterswaite Devonshire, †
Sgt John Gordon Nicholson. †
